GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct word in each gap: can or can't.
GapFillInput.ContentGapFillInput: My friend Alison is very interesting. She's very musical - shecanplay the piano and the guitar and she cansing, but she can'tdance - she never dances. She doesn't do a lot of exercise. Shecan'tride a bike and shecan'tplay tennis - she's really bad at tennis! She can'tswim so she never goes in the swimming pool. Shecandrive a car, so she doesn't walk a lot. And she cancook too. She cooks really good dinners for her friends.
